name: Peace
passiveSkills: Gain Immunity to Damage and All Negative Effects, including Silver and Unblockable effects, for 2 turns at the start of battle
Each enemy takes Additional Random Damage equal to 25% of their MAX HP after each action they take until they die at the start of battle and at the start of your turn

Whenever an ally dies for the first time in battle, they Remove All Beneficial Effects, including Golden effects, from all enemies and deal 6 hits of Additional Random Damage equal to 100% of their MAX HP to random enemies.
